resources.string: Welcome to Tic Tac Toe Game

How to Play:
The game is played on a 3x3 grid.
There are two players in the game. One player uses "X" and the other player uses "O".
The game starts with an empty grid, and the first player places their mark in any square.
The second player then places their mark in any remaining square.
The players take turns placing their marks on the grid until one of them gets three marks in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally).
If all squares are filled without any player getting three in a row, then the game is considered a draw.
